column4: theres also a file,something.local where you can add commands,which will be run on boot

rc.local will run uShare in the background before login prompt but uShare does cannot scan media directories until login. Therefore a manual start is required using "ushare" to scan directories and then "sudo /etc/init.d/ushare start" to start the UPnP server.
